items.headline: Can CoreWeave’s stock rise another 40%? A new bull makes the case.
items.summary_en: CoreWeave has a lot of debt and a concentrated customer base, but Evercore ISI thinks the stock can keep gaining thanks to technological advantages and an improving interest-rate environment.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Sudden acceleration, not a bubble, is the AI story that investors are missing, says this top researcher
items.summary_en: A blog post by a prominent AI researcher says those worried about an AI bubble, should be thinking about widespread integration by next year instead.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘The economic and political climate makes me reluctant’: I’m 80. Do I dip into my $650K retirement fund to remodel my bathroom?
items.summary_en: President Trump announced a 50% tariff on kitchen cabinets, bathroom vanities and other products, starting Oct. 1.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Fermi’s IPO to showcase Wall Street fervor for AI — and the Trump effect
items.summary_en: Fermi has yet to generate revenue as it readies its IPO of 32.5 million shares at an estimated price range of $18 to $22 each for trading Wednesday.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: I’m 44. I have $400K in cash, plus rental properties in Dubai. I’m worried about a stock-market crash. Do I dare invest?
items.summary_en: “My rental properties generate passive income of $6,000 monthly after taxes.”

items.headline: My wife and I are in our 40s. We have a $600K mortgage and $500K income. Can we afford a vacation home?
items.summary_en: “We plan to work another 20 years and we estimate $3-$4 million in 401(k) savings.”

items.headline: ‘I won’t let the government walk all over me’: The IRS says I owe $14,000 for not declaring my Social Security. What now?
items.summary_en: “I will take the IRS to court, if I must.”

items.headline: ‘He’s the breadwinner’: Does my husband take Social Security at 66 — or wait to get $800 extra at 70?
items.summary_en: “My husband jokes that he will never be able to retire because we do not own a home.”

items.headline: Could this be the worst time to retire?
items.summary_en: Current stock-market valuations mirror 1968, when stocks and bonds were on the brink of more than a decade of weak returns.

items.headline: ‘Gold is like the art market,’ declares Citi, as it hikes its target price again.
items.summary_en: Citi hike their target prices for gold and silver to $4000/oz and $55/oz respectively.
